channel.title: / ~ RSC Destiny ~ \ - Point System - Pking/Staking Server
channel.description:
Rsc Destiny is now released!
Forums : http://www.punbb-hosting.com/forums/rscdestiny/
Features:
- Point system - You get points equilvalent to the level of the mob your fighting, talk to npc's to trade your points for experience. ~ Point system certs cost 500 points use for trading to other accs or sell/stake them.
- Dragon armor added dropped by KBD (talk to billy to get ported there) *KBD now in wilderness*
- Rune armor sold in edgeville general store, runes at zaff (varrock), other armor at horvik (varrock)
- When you start off you can choose to be a mage, ranger, or a warrior, or choose none
- Blue & Red dragons drop dragon weaps located at 38 atlar or at castle
- Training spots more coming soon
- Minigames coming soon
Pics: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/5chiki.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2rcrgg1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/313kwmu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/k561r9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/13yl7it.png[/img]

item.description:
@Surname wrote:

[quote=“adu, post:10, topic:319411”][quote author=Kryptix link=topic=415879.msg3060615#msg3060615 date=1260828796]

I think that he was talking about Kill/death ratio. Until you get a kill, your kill death ratio will remain at 0.

It should go into minus figures if done properly, surely?
[/quote]

Are you serious? Go back to high school and learn some math please.[/quote]

Lol, my laugh for today.

item.title: / ~ RSC Destiny ~ \ - Point System - Pking/Staking Server
item.dc:creator: @ProjectP2P ProjectP2P
item.description:
@ProjectP2P wrote:

you know that a domain only costs 9$ for 1 year?

I’m bored at my parents house so I figured I’d browse your forums… I lol’d at this.

Please donate to help purchase a dedicated server, I will pitch in 20$ which means I only need 30$. Post here or talk to me (Jim) ingame, you will be rewarded.

Thanks!

That sounds like a very crappy VPS, not a dedi!

If you were to pitch in 20$ you would have ‘pitched’ in for a domain as well.

But meh, good luck to you and your server.

And lol @ kryptix posts… First time he made me laugh. Surprising.

Read full topic
item.source: / ~ RSC Destiny ~ \ - Point System - Pking/Staking Server

item.title: / ~ RSC Destiny ~ \ - Point System - Pking/Staking Server
item.dc:creator: @trollmuch trollmuch
item.description:
@trollmuch wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:1, topic:319527”]I had a little look but I was the only person online so it got boring really quickly. The KD ratio also said “NaN” and after I had died it then reset to 0.0 (which is obviously wrong as I had just died). I also teleported to the training area and couldn’t find anyway out apart from dying. I would suggest adding a Master Fisher to the training area too.

Most importantly though, you need players – no one will stick around if they’re the only person online.[/quote]

LMAO. you died so your kd was still 0.0… that must mean bad coding… or wait… no… that would be correct…

Read full topic
